https://tmrev.io/movie/855525-Bach Cantata Pilgrimage – The Whole Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null There was, perhaps, no more imaginative a tribute to Bach in 2000, the year which marked the 250th anniversary of the composer's death, than The Bach Cantata Pilgrimage undertaken by the Monteverdi Choir and the English Baroque Soloists under their conductor, Sir John Eliot Gardiner. Bach Cantata Pilgrimage – The Whole Story
